name: mcp-pdf-server
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for PDF text extraction operations
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server that provides PDF text extraction capabilities. This server allows AI assistants to read and extract text content from PDF files within allowed directories, with built-in security features to prevent unauthorized file access.
